column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Customentity|identifiier|value
#Text=Th?
#Text=following humourous Squib has appeared in the Morning Post.

#Text=Our ministers from Canada Heard news of sore despair, How Durham loudly had declaimed, And fiercely did declare, That since his friends had treated him So little like a brother, Hed give up hU dictator-*Aip, And embark aboard another !
#Text=He would come home !
#Text=—the dreadful news Came booming oer the deep; It shook the dust in Downing-street— It woke Glenelg from sleep 1 The placemen at each other stared, By Durham all undone!
#Text=His sroing ojfmade such a noise, For he was their great gun!
#Text=Alas!
#Text=they cried,\\he is not one To lay upon the shelf; Who 11 go out to succeed him first, And next succeed himself; The Peerage does not hold his peer !
#Text=Mild, gentle, and urbane!
#Text=Well send across the|main at once To beg him to remain !
#Text=They did.
#Text=The huge Great Western ship Was very soon to start; But still might not arrive before Lord Durham should depart.
#Text=So, as the steamer Liverpool Would first be on her way, Not to " miss stays," they sent by her.
#Text=Imploring him to stay !
#Text=The Liverpool— the Liverpool— From Liverpool forth went: OConnell blessed its sails, and prayd That they might have no rent!
#Text=Whigs hoped that theoer-mastering winds Its masts might never split; The Tories praised its Durham coals, Because they came from Pit.
#Text=Away she went—no boiler eer .
#Text=Such steam got up before!
#Text=She staggerd through the seas like one Already half-seas oer!
#Text=Her rapid paddles made the wave One briny sheet of foamShe seemd determined to get out Ere Durham could get home!
#Text=But woe !
#Text=even steam cannot control The spirit of this age!
#Text=Macready got a Tempest up On Coven t-Garden stage, The jealous winds beheld amazed False elements wake fear, And bellowd, " Blow us if we dont Get up a tempest here."
#Text=And so they did !
#Text=Poor Liverpool About the seas they drove.
#Text=Till she all the Whig coves undid, By getting into Cove !
#Text=The way she made, away was thrown,— Untackd was all her tack !
#Text=As if shed been commanded by The famous Captain Back!
#Text=No doubt she soon will sail again.
#Text=With all her wrongs redreisd !
#Text=But my Lord Durhams ship meanwhile Her homeward path hath pressd I And when the proud and haughty peer Does homage at the throne, The ministers may well get up A tempest of their own !
